Config.Resource: SELECT SUM(INVESTMENT) INVESTMENT_COUNT, MAX(INVESTMENT_TOTAL) INVESTMENT_TOTAL, SUM(CUSTOMER_COUNT) CUSTOMER_COUNT, MAX(CUSTOMER_TOTAL) CUSTOMER_TOTAL FROM ST_FIN_PHASE WHERE RECORD_DAY = STR_TO_DATE({date},'%Y%m%d')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_LABEL, CUSTOMER_CARD, CUSTOMER_PHONE, SUM(CUSTOMER_ACTION_AMOUNT) INVESTMENT_TOTAL FROM `ST_FIN_DYNAMIC` WHERE CUSTOMER_ACTION_CD=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(CUSTOMER_ACTION_DATE,'%Y%m%d') = {date} GROUP BY CUSTOMER_ID ) t ORDER BY INVESTMENT_TOTAL DESC LIMIT 3
